title: Trial by Combat
description: LOA Story Of The Week“Trial by Combat,” is about the unsettling showdown between a young woman and the not-quite-menacing widow who is her neighbor.Excepted from Novels and Stories (Library of America, 2010), pp.35-40.Originally published in The New Yorker (December 16, 1944). Reprinted in The Lottery, or, The Adventure of James Harris in 1949.
author: Shirley Jackson
